title: Introducing 2 New Shopper Intelligence Features | Similarweb
description: Automate your marketplace insights and easily export all the data you need from the Shopper Intelligence platform. Read now.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesAutomate Marketplace Insights and Export Data Easily Updates Automate Marketplace Insights and Export Data Easily Try Shopper Intelligence by Anat Avshalom , Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb 1 Min. March 31, 2022 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Looking to automate your marketplace insights? You can now analyze category and brand sales performance at scale with Similarweb’s API and export capabilities to get valuable insights faster. Read on to learn more about our latest releases. 1. Shopper Intelligence API Automate your marketplace insights with Shopper Intelligence’s API. Similarweb’s API enables you to work smarter and extract the data you need without manually accessing the platform, integrating insights directly into your existing workflow. You can also monitor marketplace sales, at the category and brand level, from your own internal dashboards. With the Shopper Intelligence API, you’ll: Reduce manual work by integrating Similarweb insights with other data sources in your internal tools and interfaces. Save time by generating automated reports with the most relevant metrics. Gain an advantage over your competitors by identifying growth opportunities across thousands of brands and categories at once. Reach out to your account manager to get access. See API documentation 2. Data Export Easily mass-export data from the platform. While a great UI is important, we know that sometimes you just want to explore data in a spreadsheet. That’s why we created a new export page that enables you to download data from Shopper Intelligence at scale. With the new export option, you can create custom analysis outside of the platform’s UI and plug the data into your own internal graphs, slides, and dashboards. Ready to give it a try? Log in to Shopper Intelligence and put these new features to the test. Don’t have access yet? Reach out to your account manager or contact us for more details. Thanks for reading and see you on the next update. by Anat Avshalom Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb Anat, with 10+ years in marketing, creates data-driven products for eCommerce. Based in Tel Aviv, she enjoys Israel’s beaches, baking, and yoga. Related Topics: Amazon Insights Product Updates This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
